content: pattern formerly at aol hometown http //members aol com/maglizrd/private/crochet/crochetsnowmen html http //members aol com/maglizrd/private/crochet/crochetsnowmen html **materials** - small amount any weight yarn - small amount stuffing - crochet hook - tapestry needle - embroidery floss or thread for mouth - 2 small beads for eyes these could be embroidered also or wiggle eyes can be used - any desired accessories i made carrot shaped noses from polymer clay you can add buttons on the body make little earmuffs or a hat and mittens a scarf a broom etc - any weight yarn or thread can be used with an appropriate hook size will change according to type of yarn and hook used i used fine fuzzy yarn with a b steel hook and the finished man was approximately 4 inches tall with lion brand jiffy yarn and a i hook height was about 7 1/2 inches
